summary: Adds forgable Ashbringer (one-handed and 2Hand) to the game
descriptionHtml:
Description
===========
Adds forgable Ashbringer (one-handed and 2 hand) to the game.
The sword is not perfect yet lol, but I\'m working on

[url=http://www.youtube.com/embed/MH-LUd1qyBo]The Ashbringer clic on me for view[/url]

Thank you OggiePoggie for the video

V1 to 1.1  just overvrite the meches textures and esp files 
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°


Location
=======
At a forge - Iron weapons section.

Install : 
=======
Extract the archive. Take the folders \"meshes\", \"textures\" and Ashbringer.esp and paste\'em in your Skyrim/Data folder. \"Yes to all\" when asked. Start Skyrim Launcher. Go to Data Files and mark Ashbringer.esp , Ok and play.

Uninstall
=========
Uncheck Ashbringer.esp in Skyrim Launcher Data Files.
Delete:
- Ashbringer.esp from your Data folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\weapons\\Ashbringer folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons\\Ashbringer folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\effects\\Ashfxbrightfash.dds
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\effects\\Ashglowsoft01.dds
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\effects\\gradients\\Ashgradlightbeam.dds
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\effects\\gradients\\gradashstorm.dds



Soft used
=========

Autodesc 3dsmax 2012
Poseray
Nifscope
TheGimp
Paint.net

Credits
========
Thanks to Bethesda for the best games.
Thanks to Blizzard for the sword concept.
author: Elixiir
